jobs.title: Product Owner/Business Analyst
jobs.description:
**JOB INTRO üîé**

At sync. money we are looking for a ‚Äòsuper-hero‚Äô Product Manager/Business Analyst and incredible new team player to join our family and help us to make a real difference. Someone to bring positive energy and a smile to the workplace. Whilst we may be building a company and a brand, we‚Äôre also building bonds that can last a lifetime.

**Other skills required as an Product Owner/Business Analyst include:**

‚Ä¢ English speaking, with multiple languages beneficial.
‚Ä¢ Hardworking, willing to take responsibility but also a co-worker.
‚Ä¢ Proactive, willing to get involved with the wider team and helping where possible.
‚Ä¢ Being passionate about your job and taking the initiative on coming up with new ideas how we can improve our product, culture and company. ‚Ä¢ You are part of the community but a user too!
‚Ä¢ Willing to learn but also to coach others where possible.
‚Ä¢ Understanding about the importance of our product, the customer experience to peoples everyday lives and the need to support them where appropriate.

**HOW YOU WILL HELP US SUCCEED**

As a Business Analyst you will:
‚Ä¢	Define the project requirements.
‚Ä¢	Keep the focus on the project.
‚Ä¢	Understand and define the stakeholders‚Äô needs.
‚Ä¢	Facilitate the conversation between business and IT.
‚Ä¢	Analyse the technical and business impacts.
‚Ä¢	Identify and the gaps between the customer and the development team.

As a Product Owner you will:
‚Ä¢	Help define the business strategy.
‚Ä¢	Keep the focus on the customer needs.
‚Ä¢	Manage the product backlog & prioritise work items.
‚Ä¢	Convey expectations & communicate the product vision.
‚Ä¢	Accept features and user stories.

**WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª**

‚Ä¢  A minimum of 2yrs of experience as a Product Owner/Business Analyst.
‚Ä¢  Strong general business analysis skills using relevant tools including JIRA, Excel, etc‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢  Functional Specification Documents, User Stories (in BDD format), change requests and screen and interface design.
‚Ä¢  Sound knowledge of systems analysis and design tools and techniques.
‚Ä¢  Maintain a detail-oriented focus and aptitude for solving unstructured problems.
‚Ä¢  Written and verbal communication skills.
‚Ä¢  Understanding of banking, finance, and/or business banking needs.
‚Ä¢  Awareness of FCA regulatory framework.
‚Ä¢  Extremely curious and drives issues to root cause.
‚Ä¢  Diplomatic with conflict resolution skills.


**SALARY üíµ**

Will market competitive and will depend on the location, position and experience of the candidate.


**WHO WE ARE üòé**

sync. is a young and exciting FinTech company headquartered at Level39 in Canary Wharf in the Centre of London with a second hub in the Historical Centre of Malaga, Spain, right next to the Picasso Museum. Our driving ambition is to save people time and money. It‚Äôs what motivates us to come in to work every morning knowing that we could be making a real difference to people‚Äôs lives.

We combine the very best of features and services across the market, whilst also creating our own, to make a unique product that can be everything to everyone. We always say that great products and built by great teams. We‚Äôre very much on our way to building both but need more great people to achieve all of our lofty goals and ambitions. Are you that person? Apply now

Why the ‚úñÔ∏è, crossover, where old banking meets the new world of innovation, disruption and inclusion. We are sync. and you could be too.

Read more about us on our blog or follow our latest news on Twitter.


**WHY US ü§î**

There are 2 things we love doing. Disrupting the relevant landscape and saving people money. We know what you‚Äôre thinking. It‚Äôs either ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the connection between the two?‚Äù or ‚ÄúSo do I, so how can I be involved?‚Äù. Well we have the answer to both questions, read on‚Ä¶

As a result, we‚Äôre now looking for motivated applicants to join our team as we develop our new product. This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking. 

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!


**WHAT WE DO ‚úñÔ∏è**

We are aiming to lead the way in Smart Open Banking. We allow users to instantly open a current GBP &/or EUR account in minutes and we provide them with the ability to open up to 30+ other currency accounts. Users are able to exchange currencies between their accounts at the best rates and transfer money worldwide and unbeatable rates. Learn more about our features here.

sync.‚Äôs USP is to allow users to synchronise all of their financial accounts (bank, credit, loan and mortgage accounts) in one app, as one experience by utilising our AISP snd PISP licenses. By being able to budget, manage and track all of their accounts and expenses in one place, offering our users unrivalled user experience as a money management platform and be their financial advisor.

This then translates into tailored recommendations on how to save time and money through our marketplace of products from numerous financial and retail service providers that we have deals with.

"Our ultimate goal is for our users to better understand their saving, spending and investing habits and to make easy, simple, beautiful and accessible to everyone".


**WHAT WE OFFER üèÜ**

>  Salary package that rewards you.

Hard-working, dedicated and talented people deserve to be rewarded and that‚Äôs why we offer you a salary and bonus package that will reward you for your contribution.

>  Flexible hours for a flexible lifestyle.

We know flexibility is important in this day and age. We also know we can trust you to know when you‚Äôre at your best, which is why we encourage working smarter not harder.

>  Satisfying and fulfilling.

Both of our offices are stocked with plenty of snacks and drinks for you to enjoy.

>  A workplace for you.

Choose between our City Centre office in London or by the beach in Malaga. Regardless of which one you choose we‚Äôll make sure you‚Äôre using the best equipment available.

>  Discounts to cash in on.

Use our dedicated employee portal to save you time and money at some of your favourite retailers and restaurant.


**SOME OTHER BENEFITS üèÜ**

>  An office you can call home.

Use our beautiful office space to organise and run events planned by our team, for our team, for a fun filled evening. Feel free to get involved and organise some yourself!

>  Opportunities to Grow.

We love when people join us and stay with us and that‚Äôs why we offer you amazing growth opportunities. You have the opportunities for promotions, internal transfers and even international transfers as we look to open up more offices worldwide.

If you want to build sync. in your country or in your city then tell us, push us and help us expand our technology and values to your home.

>  Our products are for everyone, and so are our offices.

We value diversity on an individual level. We‚Äôre dedicated to creating an environment where people can share their own diverse backgrounds, experiences, perspectives & ideas.

sync. money is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.


**READY TO TAKE THE LEAP? üöÄ**

Feel like you‚Äôre ready to accept the challenge and embark on a new and exciting chapter of your life? Click below to apply for the Product Owner/Business Analyst job role at sync. money and let‚Äôs make a difference together.


**RECRUITERS NOTICE ‚ö†Ô∏è**

This Role is for direct applications only for a full time position and our HR Department will not be responding to any Recruitment Agencies, software firms or freelancers that contact us.

‚Ä¢	Build features and maintain frontend services by implementing defined work issues.
‚Ä¢	Improve and maintain existing code.
‚Ä¢	Work with databases, servers, microservices, and APIs, and the integration of all these processes with the native environment.
‚Ä¢	Work collaboratively by proposing solutions and alternative point of views to problems.
‚Ä¢	Pair Programming and Code Reviews.
‚Ä¢	Participate in SCRUM ceremonies.


**WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª**

‚Ä¢	A minimum of 3 to 4yrs of coding as an Android Developer and have published apps
‚Ä¢	Expert knowledge in the latest and greatest aspects of Kotlin programming language.
‚Ä¢	Expert knowledge of Android SDK and Android newest Tools framework. We use a really up to date stack of technologies, with coroutines, livedata, navigation graph‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢	Knowledge of architectural patterns, specially clean architecture and a taste for good quality code.
‚Ä¢	Testing expertise, in different layers of the application development, from unit to e2e tests.
‚Ä¢	Complete understanding and experience in Android UI development.
‚Ä¢	Experience using Web Services and Data parsing using JSON, XML etc.
‚Ä¢	Strong with code versioning and pre-release routines via tools such as firebase for purposes of A/B testing.
‚Ä¢	Strong OO design skills, database design and network programming fundamentals.
‚Ä¢	Very good knowledge of Android Studio, including automated app usage tests.
‚Ä¢	Good understanding of data structures and algorithms.
‚Ä¢	Know-how working with Git.
‚Ä¢	Have an eye for User Interface design as engineers on the teams are expected to code both front and backend deliverables

jobs.title: Community Manager
jobs.description:
**JOB INTRO üîé**

At sync. money we are looking for a ‚Äòsuper-hero‚Äô Community Manager and incredible new team player to join our family and help us to make a real difference. Someone to bring positive energy and a smile to the workplace. Whilst we may be building a company and a brand, we‚Äôre also building bonds that can last a lifetime.

**Other skills required as an Community Manager include:**

‚Ä¢ English speaking, with multiple languages beneficial.
‚Ä¢ Hardworking, willing to take responsibility but also a co-worker.
‚Ä¢ Proactive, willing to get involved with the wider team and helping where possible.
‚Ä¢ Being passionate about your job and taking the initiative on coming up with new ideas how we can improve our product, culture and company. ‚Ä¢ You are part of the community but a user too!
‚Ä¢ Willing to learn but also to coach others where possible.
‚Ä¢ Understanding about the importance of our product, the customer experience to peoples everyday lives and the need to support them where appropriate.

**HOW YOU WILL HELP US SUCCEED**

‚Ä¢  Manage key initiatives and be the ‚Äògo to‚Äô person for Community Operations.
‚Ä¢  Always be curious to find new avenues for more community engagement through different mediums and techniques.
‚Ä¢  Acquire and integrate industry knowledge related to general trends, emerging technologies and competitors.
‚Ä¢  Understand and monitor the performance metric of our community engagement and provide insight into what our community wants.
‚Ä¢  Pitch ideas on improving our community members‚Äô experience.

**WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª**

‚Ä¢  A minimum of 2yrs of experience as a Community Manager.
‚Ä¢  Experience working in social media, marketing, managing online communities, or customer support ideally within a FinTech, bank or start-up.
‚Ä¢  The ability to work in a fast-pace agile environment with superior organisational skills and great follow-through on tasks.
‚Ä¢  Experience in design and/or video editing skills is desirable.
‚Ä¢  Be a brilliant communicator striking the perfect tone and messaging.


**SALARY üíµ**

Will market competitive and will depend on the location, position and experience of the candidate.


**WHO WE ARE üòé**

sync. is a young and exciting FinTech company headquartered at Level39 in Canary Wharf in the Centre of London with a second hub in the Historical Centre of Malaga, Spain, right next to the Picasso Museum. Our driving ambition is to save people time and money. It‚Äôs what motivates us to come in to work every morning knowing that we could be making a real difference to people‚Äôs lives.

We combine the very best of features and services across the market, whilst also creating our own, to make a unique product that can be everything to everyone. We always say that great products and built by great teams. We‚Äôre very much on our way to building both but need more great people to achieve all of our lofty goals and ambitions. Are you that person? Apply now

Why the ‚úñÔ∏è, crossover, where old banking meets the new world of innovation, disruption and inclusion. We are sync. and you could be too.

Read more about us on our blog or follow our latest news on Twitter.


**WHY US ü§î**

There are 2 things we love doing. Disrupting the relevant landscape and saving people money. We know what you‚Äôre thinking. It‚Äôs either ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the connection between the two?‚Äù or ‚ÄúSo do I, so how can I be involved?‚Äù. Well we have the answer to both questions, read on‚Ä¶

As a result, we‚Äôre now looking for motivated applicants to join our team as we develop our new product. This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking. 

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!


**WHAT WE DO ‚úñÔ∏è**

We are aiming to lead the way in Smart Open Banking. We allow users to instantly open a current GBP &/or EUR account in minutes and we provide them with the ability to open up to 30+ other currency accounts. Users are able to exchange currencies between their accounts at the best rates and transfer money worldwide and unbeatable rates. Learn more about our features here.

sync.‚Äôs USP is to allow users to synchronise all of their financial accounts (bank, credit, loan and mortgage accounts) in one app, as one experience by utilising our AISP snd PISP licenses. By being able to budget, manage and track all of their accounts and expenses in one place, offering our users unrivalled user experience as a money management platform and be their financial advisor.

This then translates into tailored recommendations on how to save time and money through our marketplace of products from numerous financial and retail service providers that we have deals with.

"Our ultimate goal is for our users to better understand their saving, spending and investing habits and to make easy, simple, beautiful and accessible to everyone".


**WHAT WE OFFER üèÜ**

>  Salary package that rewards you.

Hard-working, dedicated and talented people deserve to be rewarded and that‚Äôs why we offer you a salary and bonus package that will reward you for your contribution.

>  Flexible hours for a flexible lifestyle.

We know flexibility is important in this day and age. We also know we can trust you to know when you‚Äôre at your best, which is why we encourage working smarter not harder.

>  Satisfying and fulfilling.

Both of our offices are stocked with plenty of snacks and drinks for you to enjoy.

>  A workplace for you.

Choose between our City Centre office in London or by the beach in Malaga. Regardless of which one you choose we‚Äôll make sure you‚Äôre using the best equipment available.

>  Discounts to cash in on.

Use our dedicated employee portal to save you time and money at some of your favourite retailers and restaurant.


**SOME OTHER BENEFITS üèÜ**

>  An office you can call home.

Use our beautiful office space to organise and run events planned by our team, for our team, for a fun filled evening. Feel free to get involved and organise some yourself!

>  Opportunities to Grow.

We love when people join us and stay with us and that‚Äôs why we offer you amazing growth opportunities. You have the opportunities for promotions, internal transfers and even international transfers as we look to open up more offices worldwide.

If you want to build sync. in your country or in your city then tell us, push us and help us expand our technology and values to your home.

>  Our products are for everyone, and so are our offices.

We value diversity on an individual level. We‚Äôre dedicated to creating an environment where people can share their own diverse backgrounds, experiences, perspectives & ideas.

sync. money is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.


**READY TO TAKE THE LEAP? üöÄ**

Feel like you‚Äôre ready to accept the challenge and embark on a new and exciting chapter of your life? Click below to apply for the Community Manager job role at sync. money and let‚Äôs make a difference together.


**RECRUITERS NOTICE ‚ö†Ô∏è**

This Role is for direct applications only for a full time position and our HR Department will not be responding to any Recruitment Agencies, software firms or freelancers that contact us.

jobs.title: QA Tester
jobs.description:
**JOB INTRO üîé**

At sync. money we are looking for a ‚Äòsuper-hero‚Äô QA Tester and incredible new team player to join our family and help us to make a real difference. Someone to bring positive energy and a smile to the workplace. Whilst we may be building a company and a brand, we‚Äôre also building bonds that can last a lifetime.

**Other skills required as an QA Tester include:**

‚Ä¢ English speaking, with multiple languages beneficial.
‚Ä¢ Hardworking, willing to take responsibility but also a co-worker.
‚Ä¢ Proactive, willing to get involved with the wider team and helping where possible.
‚Ä¢ Being passionate about your job and taking the initiative on coming up with new ideas how we can improve our product, culture and company. ‚Ä¢ You are part of the community but a user too!
‚Ä¢ Willing to learn but also to coach others where possible.
‚Ä¢ Understanding about the importance of our product, the customer experience to peoples everyday lives and the need to support them where appropriate.

**HOW YOU WILL HELP US SUCCEED**

Your main role as a QA Tester is to ensure that end users enjoy a frictionless experience when using sync.‚Äôs app. A key part of achieving this is through testing, while referring back to the business requirements, to ensure that the expected features, functions, and capabilities are available and work as intended.
You will be working closely with Developers, Business Analysts and Project Managers to track defects through to resolution, working as a team to improve features and processes.
Your main responsibilities will be:
‚Ä¢  Becoming an expert of our native application (OS, Android and Web).
‚Ä¢  Gathering, updating, or verifying requirement specifications.
‚Ä¢  Writing test conditions and test cases.
‚Ä¢  Running manual test cases.
‚Ä¢  Identifying bugs and writing JIRA tickets to report and track them.
‚Ä¢  Touching base with developers and business analysts.
‚Ä¢  Participating in SCRUM ceremonies.

**WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª**

‚Ä¢  Bachelors degree in Computer Science or other technical field, OR equivalent related field work experience of at least 2 years in a QA Tester or Analyst role.
‚Ä¢  Strong Analytical skills.
‚Ä¢  Strong teamwork and interpersonal communication skills.
‚Ä¢  Ability to acquire technical and professional knowledge quickly.
‚Ä¢  Ability to effectively manage multiple tasks.
‚Ä¢  Fluent in English.
‚Ä¢  Knowledge of the software development life cycle, especially in the analysis of software design and code development and its application to testing.
‚Ä¢  Experience in Functional and Performance testing.
‚Ä¢  Experience with Web or Native UX/UI testing.
‚Ä¢  Experience with bug tracking tools such as JIRA.
‚Ä¢  Experience with APIs and Postman.
‚Ä¢  Opportunity to expand the role into a hybrid position as Business Analyst.

We will be providing training for this role and looking for candidates that are eager to learn, grow, and develop their technical knowledge and skills.


**SALARY üíµ**

Will market competitive and will depend on the location, position and experience of the candidate.


**WHO WE ARE üòé**

sync. is a young and exciting FinTech company headquartered at Level39 in Canary Wharf in the Centre of London with a second hub in the Historical Centre of Malaga, Spain, right next to the Picasso Museum. Our driving ambition is to save people time and money. It‚Äôs what motivates us to come in to work every morning knowing that we could be making a real difference to people‚Äôs lives.

We combine the very best of features and services across the market, whilst also creating our own, to make a unique product that can be everything to everyone. We always say that great products and built by great teams. We‚Äôre very much on our way to building both but need more great people to achieve all of our lofty goals and ambitions. Are you that person? Apply now

Why the ‚úñÔ∏è, crossover, where old banking meets the new world of innovation, disruption and inclusion. We are sync. and you could be too.

Read more about us on our blog or follow our latest news on Twitter.


**WHY US ü§î**

There are 2 things we love doing. Disrupting the relevant landscape and saving people money. We know what you‚Äôre thinking. It‚Äôs either ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the connection between the two?‚Äù or ‚ÄúSo do I, so how can I be involved?‚Äù. Well we have the answer to both questions, read on‚Ä¶

As a result, we‚Äôre now looking for motivated applicants to join our team as we develop our new product. This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking. 

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!


**WHAT WE DO ‚úñÔ∏è**

We are aiming to lead the way in Smart Open Banking. We allow users to instantly open a current GBP &/or EUR account in minutes and we provide them with the ability to open up to 30+ other currency accounts. Users are able to exchange currencies between their accounts at the best rates and transfer money worldwide and unbeatable rates. Learn more about our features here.

sync.‚Äôs USP is to allow users to synchronise all of their financial accounts (bank, credit, loan and mortgage accounts) in one app, as one experience by utilising our AISP snd PISP licenses. By being able to budget, manage and track all of their accounts and expenses in one place, offering our users unrivalled user experience as a money management platform and be their financial advisor.

This then translates into tailored recommendations on how to save time and money through our marketplace of products from numerous financial and retail service providers that we have deals with.

"Our ultimate goal is for our users to better understand their saving, spending and investing habits and to make easy, simple, beautiful and accessible to everyone".


**WHAT WE OFFER üèÜ**

>  Salary package that rewards you.

Hard-working, dedicated and talented people deserve to be rewarded and that‚Äôs why we offer you a salary and bonus package that will reward you for your contribution.

>  Flexible hours for a flexible lifestyle.

We know flexibility is important in this day and age. We also know we can trust you to know when you‚Äôre at your best, which is why we encourage working smarter not harder.

>  Satisfying and fulfilling.

Both of our offices are stocked with plenty of snacks and drinks for you to enjoy.

>  A workplace for you.

Choose between our City Centre office in London or by the beach in Malaga. Regardless of which one you choose we‚Äôll make sure you‚Äôre using the best equipment available.

>  Discounts to cash in on.

Use our dedicated employee portal to save you time and money at some of your favourite retailers and restaurant.


**SOME OTHER BENEFITS üèÜ**

>  An office you can call home.

Use our beautiful office space to organise and run events planned by our team, for our team, for a fun filled evening. Feel free to get involved and organise some yourself!

>  Opportunities to Grow.

We love when people join us and stay with us and that‚Äôs why we offer you amazing growth opportunities. You have the opportunities for promotions, internal transfers and even international transfers as we look to open up more offices worldwide.

If you want to build sync. in your country or in your city then tell us, push us and help us expand our technology and values to your home.

>  Our products are for everyone, and so are our offices.

We value diversity on an individual level. We‚Äôre dedicated to creating an environment where people can share their own diverse backgrounds, experiences, perspectives & ideas.

sync. money is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.


**READY TO TAKE THE LEAP? üöÄ**

Feel like you‚Äôre ready to accept the challenge and embark on a new and exciting chapter of your life? Click below to apply for the QA Tester job role at sync. money and let‚Äôs make a difference together.


**RECRUITERS NOTICE ‚ö†Ô∏è**

This Role is for direct applications only for a full time position and our HR Department will not be responding to any Recruitment Agencies, software firms or freelancers that contact us.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
At sync. we are building an everyday mobile banking platform that has the potential to disrupt one of the most established global industries.
So, we need a ‚Äòsuper-hero‚Äô Business Development Manager who can improve our organisation's market position and achieve financial growth.
If you have prior experience working in the banking industry and if you think you‚Äôre up to the challenge of joining our superstar squad then WE WANT YOU!

WE NEED YOU TO
Plan and oversee new marketing initiatives.
Research and outreach to organisations and individuals to find new opportunities.
Strengthen customer relationships while attracting new ones.
Develop business and marketing plans in coordination with the Managing Director to achieve revenue goals.
Set up and oversee our finance IT system.
Assist in the company's branding and media communication activities such as press releases, advertisements, marketing and social platforms.

YOU WILL NEED TO HAVE
3+ years experience in business development functions, ideally within the banking industry.
Project Management, research & strategy.
Negotiation & Persuasion skills.
Communication & Interpersonal Skills.

WHO WE ARE
For the past 3 years our passion has been to save thousands of people time and money.
Through our platform, people can transfer money internationally and exchange currencies at the cheapest rates in the shortest time possible.
Now here‚Äôs a little secret‚Ä¶ What we‚Äôre currently working on is going to blow our previous product and your mind away!
We‚Äôre building a mobile based platform to make your finances easier by building an all-in-one app that synchronises all your financial accounts and simplifies payments.
This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking.

WE CAN OFFER YOU
The chance to work under the guidance of our CEO, who pioneered mobile banking at Lloyds, NatWest, Halifax and challenger applications like Revolut.
An international, fun and dynamic team that is located in the heart of the financial district of Canary Wharf at the largest Fintech Accelerator in Europe - Level 39 in London, UK.
Exciting work on an innovative project with plenty of responsibility and freedom.
A modern cafeteria offering complimentary access to hot drinks, fresh fruit and more importantly 3pm cookie time.
Fun social nights out.
If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!
Feel like you‚Äôre ready to accept the challenge and embark on a new and exciting chapter of your life?
Let‚Äôs make a difference. Together.

Sync.Money UK Ltd is an equal opportunities employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age or veteran status. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
All successful candidates will be required to undertake Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) checks at the appropriate level for the post.

jobs.title: Complaints Analyst
jobs.description:
**JOB INTRO üîé**

At sync. money we are looking for a ‚Äòsuper-hero‚Äô Complaints Analyst and incredible new team player to join our family and help us to make a real difference. Someone to bring positive energy and a smile to the workplace. Whilst we may be building a company and a brand, we‚Äôre also building bonds that can last a lifetime.

**Other skills required as a Complaints Analyst include:**

‚Ä¢ English speaking, with multiple languages beneficial.
‚Ä¢ Hardworking, willing to take responsibility but also a co-worker.
‚Ä¢ Proactive, willing to get involved with the wider team and helping where possible.
‚Ä¢ Being passionate about your job and taking the initiative on coming up with new ideas how we can improve our product, culture and company. ‚Ä¢ You are part of the community but a user too!
‚Ä¢ Willing to learn but also to coach others where possible.
‚Ä¢ Understanding about the importance of our product, the customer experience to peoples everyday lives and the need to support them where appropriate.

**HOW YOU WILL HELP US SUCCEED**

‚Ä¢  To work as part of a highly motivated team and ensure that all complaints are handled with the highest standard of customer care.
‚Ä¢  Maintain complaints database with correct and relevant information at all times.
‚Ä¢  Manage own caseload, ensuring all complaints are handled within required deadlines and FCA requirements.
‚Ä¢  Research root cause of complaints and use information to ensure consistency in processes and procedures.
‚Ä¢  Work closely & liaise with our Partners to ensure all complaints are handled and resolved correctly.
‚Ä¢  Report to the Customer Support Manager and Head of Compliance to file cases to the FCA and correspond to the FOS.
‚Ä¢  Draft and finalise a response to the complainant using excellent writing & communication skills.
‚Ä¢  Keep up-to-date with relevant rules and regulations and update policy and procedures accordingly.

**WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª**

‚Ä¢  A minimum of 2yrs of experience as a Complaints Analyst in the banking, payments or e-Money industries.
‚Ä¢  Experience dealing with difficult situations in a professional manner whilst being resilient and decisive, confident to make decisions.
‚Ä¢  Strong communication skills both verbally and in writing.
‚Ä¢  Experience in FOS case management; Preparing files for FOS submission and replying to FOS correspondence.
‚Ä¢  Ability to understand and comply with documented processes, policies and procedures.


**SALARY üíµ**

Will market competitive and will depend on the location, position and experience of the candidate.


**WHO WE ARE üòé**

sync. is a young and exciting FinTech company headquartered at Level39 in Canary Wharf in the Centre of London with a second hub in the Historical Centre of Malaga, Spain, right next to the Picasso Museum. Our driving ambition is to save people time and money. It‚Äôs what motivates us to come in to work every morning knowing that we could be making a real difference to people‚Äôs lives.

We combine the very best of features and services across the market, whilst also creating our own, to make a unique product that can be everything to everyone. We always say that great products and built by great teams. We‚Äôre very much on our way to building both but need more great people to achieve all of our lofty goals and ambitions. Are you that person? Apply now

Why the ‚úñÔ∏è, crossover, where old banking meets the new world of innovation, disruption and inclusion. We are sync. and you could be too.

Read more about us on our blog or follow our latest news on Twitter.


**WHY US ü§î**

There are 2 things we love doing. Disrupting the relevant landscape and saving people money. We know what you‚Äôre thinking. It‚Äôs either ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the connection between the two?‚Äù or ‚ÄúSo do I, so how can I be involved?‚Äù. Well we have the answer to both questions, read on‚Ä¶

As a result, we‚Äôre now looking for motivated applicants to join our team as we develop our new product. This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking. 

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!


**WHAT WE DO ‚úñÔ∏è**

We are aiming to lead the way in Smart Open Banking. We allow users to instantly open a current GBP &/or EUR account in minutes and we provide them with the ability to open up to 30+ other currency accounts. Users are able to exchange currencies between their accounts at the best rates and transfer money worldwide and unbeatable rates. Learn more about our features here.

sync.‚Äôs USP is to allow users to synchronise all of their financial accounts (bank, credit, loan and mortgage accounts) in one app, as one experience by utilising our AISP snd PISP licenses. By being able to budget, manage and track all of their accounts and expenses in one place, offering our users unrivalled user experience as a money management platform and be their financial advisor.

This then translates into tailored recommendations on how to save time and money through our marketplace of products from numerous financial and retail service providers that we have deals with.

"Our ultimate goal is for our users to better understand their saving, spending and investing habits and to make easy, simple, beautiful and accessible to everyone".


**WHAT WE OFFER üèÜ**

>  Salary package that rewards you.

Hard-working, dedicated and talented people deserve to be rewarded and that‚Äôs why we offer you a salary and bonus package that will reward you for your contribution.

>  Flexible hours for a flexible lifestyle.

We know flexibility is important in this day and age. We also know we can trust you to know when you‚Äôre at your best, which is why we encourage working smarter not harder.

>  Satisfying and fulfilling.

Both of our offices are stocked with plenty of snacks and drinks for you to enjoy.

>  A workplace for you.

Choose between our City Centre office in London or by the beach in Malaga. Regardless of which one you choose we‚Äôll make sure you‚Äôre using the best equipment available.

>  Discounts to cash in on.

Use our dedicated employee portal to save you time and money at some of your favourite retailers and restaurant.


**SOME OTHER BENEFITS üèÜ**

>  An office you can call home.

Use our beautiful office space to organise and run events planned by our team, for our team, for a fun filled evening. Feel free to get involved and organise some yourself!

>  Opportunities to Grow.

We love when people join us and stay with us and that‚Äôs why we offer you amazing growth opportunities. You have the opportunities for promotions, internal transfers and even international transfers as we look to open up more offices worldwide.

If you want to build sync. in your country or in your city then tell us, push us and help us expand our technology and values to your home.

>  Our products are for everyone, and so are our offices.

We value diversity on an individual level. We‚Äôre dedicated to creating an environment where people can share their own diverse backgrounds, experiences, perspectives & ideas.

sync. money is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.


**READY TO TAKE THE LEAP? üöÄ**

Feel like you‚Äôre ready to accept the challenge and embark on a new and exciting chapter of your life? Click below to apply for the Complaints Analyst job role at sync. money and let‚Äôs make a difference together.


**RECRUITERS NOTICE ‚ö†Ô∏è**

This Role is for direct applications only for a full time position and our HR Department will not be responding to any Recruitment Agencies, software firms or freelancers that contact us.

‚Ä¢ Take ownership of customer enquiries and respond to escalated customer issues in accordance with agreed procedures.
‚Ä¢ Work well with other departments as necessary to ensure complete, accurate and timely resolution of customer issues.
‚Ä¢ Build rapport to resolve service issues and customer questions.
‚Ä¢ Recognise that quality is measured through call recordings and case auditing.
‚Ä¢ Meet established goals for all metrics, including communications quality and productivity by focusing on maximising service to customers.
‚Ä¢ Present ideas in a professional manner and support ongoing business development efforts.

WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª

‚Ä¢ A minimum of 2yrs of experience as a Customer Support Assistant.
‚Ä¢ Exceptional customer experience during every interaction.
‚Ä¢ Reliable attendance.
‚Ä¢ Self-motivated and results driven.
‚Ä¢ A positive, can-do attitude.
‚Ä¢ The ability to work well on a team as well as independently.
‚Ä¢ Highly experienced working with multiple systems, including Zendesk & Intercom.
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills (both written and verbal), highly organised, collaborative, and detail oriented.
‚Ä¢ Previous experience in a similar customer support environment.
‚Ä¢ Willingness to accept coaching and feedback.

sync. is a young and exciting FinTech company headquartered at Level39 in Canary Wharf in the Centre of London with a second hub in the Historical Centre of Malaga, Spain, right next to the Picasso Museum. We combine the very best of features and services across the market, whilst also creating our own, to make a unique product that can be everything to everyone. We always say that great products and built by great teams. We‚Äôre very much on our way to building both but need more great people to achieve all of our lofty goals and ambitions. Why the ‚úñÔ∏è, crossover, where old banking meets the new world of innovation, disruption and inclusion. We are sync. and you could be too.

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!

WHAT WE DO ‚úñÔ∏è

We are aiming to lead the way in Smart Open Banking. Users are able to exchange currencies between their accounts at the best rates and transfer money worldwide and unbeatable rates. Learn more about our features here.

sync.‚Äôs USP is to allow users to synchronise all of their financial accounts (bank, credit, loan and mortgage accounts) in one app, as one experience by utilising our AISP snd PISP licenses. This then translates into tailored recommendations on how to save time and money through our marketplace of products from numerous financial and retail service providers that we have deals with.

"Our ultimate goal is for our users to better understand their saving, spending and investing habits and to make easy, simple, beautiful and accessible to everyone".

> Salary package that rewards you.

Hard-working, dedicated and talented people deserve to be rewarded and that‚Äôs why we offer you a salary and bonus package that will reward you for your contribution.

> Flexible hours for a flexible lifestyle.

We know flexibility is important in this day and age. We also know we can trust you to know when you‚Äôre at your best, which is why we encourage working smarter not harder.

> Satisfying and fulfilling.

Both of our offices are stocked with plenty of snacks and drinks for you to enjoy.

> A workplace for you.

Choose between our City Centre office in London or by the beach in Malaga. Regardless of which one you choose we‚Äôll make sure you‚Äôre using the best equipment available.

> Discounts to cash in on.

Use our dedicated employee portal to save you time and money at some of your favourite retailers and restaurant.

> An office you can call home.

Use our beautiful office space to organise and run events planned by our team, for our team, for a fun filled evening. Feel free to get involved and organise some yourself!

We value diversity on an individual level. We‚Äôre dedicated to creating an environment where people can share their own diverse backgrounds, experiences, perspectives & ideas.

sync. money is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. ‚Ä¢ Work with databases, servers, microservices, and APIs, and the integration of all these processes with the native environment.
‚Ä¢ Work collaboratively by proposing solutions and alternative point of views to problems.
‚Ä¢ Pair Programming, Unit Testing and Code Reviews.
‚Ä¢ Participate in SCRUM ceremonies.

WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª

As a Frontend Developer you will join an energetic team which is passionate about transforming Banking and the Personal Finance landscape.
This position is open to Junior Frontend Developers looking for the next step in their career and Mid-Level Frontend Developers looking for exposure to high-profile projects and the latest tech in a role that is passionate about the future of the FinTech industry.

‚Ä¢ A minimum of 4yrs of coding as a Frontend Developer.
‚Ä¢ A minimum of 2yrs experience as a React developer.
‚Ä¢ Good experience of writing JavaScript tests.
‚Ä¢ CSS, SCSS, LESS.
‚Ä¢ JavaScript/ES6 and Jest (or other testing frameworks).
‚Ä¢ Experience of working with Continuous Integration (CI) and Unit Testing.
‚Ä¢ APIs and core data knowledge.
‚Ä¢ Excellent debugging skills.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Git.
‚Ä¢ Agile/Scrum experience.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of socket based networking desirable.

SALARY üíµ

Will market competitive and will depend on the location, position and experience of the candidate.

WHO WE ARE üòé

sync. is a young and exciting FinTech company headquartered at Level39 in Canary Wharf in the Centre of London with a second hub in the Historical Centre of Malaga, Spain, right next to the Picasso Museum. Our driving ambition is to save people time and money. It‚Äôs what motivates us to come in to work every morning knowing that we could be making a real difference to people‚Äôs lives.

We combine the very best of features and services across the market, whilst also creating our own, to make a unique product that can be everything to everyone. We always say that great products and built by great teams. We‚Äôre very much on our way to building both but need more great people to achieve all of our lofty goals and ambitions. Are you that person? Apply now

Why the ‚úñÔ∏è, crossover, where old banking meets the new world of innovation, disruption and inclusion. We are sync. and you could be too.

Read more about us on our blog or follow our latest news on Twitter.

There are 2 things we love doing. Disrupting the relevant landscape and saving people money. We know what you‚Äôre thinking. It‚Äôs either ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the connection between the two?‚Äù or ‚ÄúSo do I, so how can I be involved?‚Äù. Well we have the answer to both questions, read on‚Ä¶

As a result, we‚Äôre now looking for motivated applicants to join our team as we develop our new product. This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking.

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!

WHAT WE DO ‚úñÔ∏è

We are aiming to lead the way in Smart Open Banking. We allow users to instantly open a current GBP &/or EUR account in minutes and we provide them with the ability to open up to 30+ other currency accounts. Users are able to exchange currencies between their accounts at the best rates and transfer money worldwide and unbeatable rates. Learn more about our features here.

sync.‚Äôs USP is to allow users to synchronise all of their financial accounts (bank, credit, loan and mortgage accounts) in one app, as one experience by utilising our AISP snd PISP licenses. By being able to budget, manage and track all of their accounts and expenses in one place, offering our users unrivalled user experience as a money management platform and be their financial advisor.

This then translates into tailored recommendations on how to save time and money through our marketplace of products from numerous financial and retail service providers that we have deals with.

"Our ultimate goal is for our users to better understand their saving, spending and investing habits and to make easy, simple, beautiful and accessible to everyone".

WHAT WE OFFER üèÜ

> Salary package that rewards you.

Hard-working, dedicated and talented people deserve to be rewarded and that‚Äôs why we offer you a salary and bonus package that will reward you for your contribution.

> Flexible hours for a flexible lifestyle.

We know flexibility is important in this day and age. We also know we can trust you to know when you‚Äôre at your best, which is why we encourage working smarter not harder.

> Satisfying and fulfilling.

Both of our offices are stocked with plenty of snacks and drinks for you to enjoy.

> A workplace for you.

Choose between our City Centre office in London or by the beach in Malaga. Regardless of which one you choose we‚Äôll make sure you‚Äôre using the best equipment available.

> Discounts to cash in on.

Use our dedicated employee portal to save you time and money at some of your favourite retailers and restaurant.

SOME OTHER BENEFITS üèÜ

> An office you can call home.

Use our beautiful office space to organise and run events planned by our team, for our team, for a fun filled evening. Feel free to get involved and organise some yourself!

> Opportunities to Grow.

We love when people join us and stay with us and that‚Äôs why we offer you amazing growth opportunities. You have the opportunities for promotions, internal transfers and even international transfers as we look to open up more offices worldwide.

If you want to build sync. in your country or in your city then tell us, push us and help us expand our technology and values to your home.

> Our products are for everyone, and so are our offices.

We value diversity on an individual level. We‚Äôre dedicated to creating an environment where people can share their own diverse backgrounds, experiences, perspectives & ideas.

sync. money is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

‚Ä¢	Build features and maintain backend services.
‚Ä¢	Improve and maintain existing code.
‚Ä¢	Work with databases, servers, microservices, and APIs, and the integration of all these processes.
‚Ä¢	Work collaboratively by proposing solutions and alternative point of views to problems.
‚Ä¢	Pair Programming and Code Reviews.
‚Ä¢	Participate in SCRUM ceremonies.

jobs.title: Head of HR
jobs.description:
At sync. we are building an everyday mobile banking platform that has the potential to disrupt one of the most established global industries. 

Design and user experience are everything for us. So we need a ‚Äòsuper-hero‚Äô Human Resources & Admin Officer to join our team and support the day-to-day activities of our Human Resources Department in an efficient way. 

If you have prior experience working in Human Resources in the banking industry and if you think you‚Äôre up to the challenge of joining our superstar squad then WE WANT YOU!


WE ARE LOOKING FOR  üîé

-	An HR & Admin Officer who will make sure all HR Operations run smoothly.

-	Maintaining physical and digital personnel records like employment contracts and personal time off requests.

-	Update internal databases with new hire information.

-	Create and distribute guidelines and FAQ documents about company policies.

-	Gather payroll data like bank accounts and working days.

-	Create, publish and remove job ads in the different platforms.

-	Schedule job interviews and contact candidates as needed.

-	Prepare reports and presentations on HR-related metrics like total number of hires by department.

-	Develop training and on boarding material.

-	Respond to employees questions about benefits (for example, number of vacation days they‚Äôre eligible for).


WHAT WE NEED üòé

-	Prior experience as an HR & Admin Officer, HR Administrative Assistant or similar role. 

-	Familiarity with Human Resources Information Systems (HRIS).

-	Knowledge of labour legislation.

-	Experience using spreadsheets. 

-	Experience organizational skills.

-	Strong written and verbal communication skills and listening skills.

-	BSc in Human Resources Management or relevant field.

WHO WE ARE ü§î

For the last 3 years, our passion has been saving thousands of people time and money. 

Through our platform, people can transfer money internationally and exchange currencies at the cheapest rates in the shortest time possible.

Now here‚Äôs a little secret‚Ä¶ What we‚Äôre currently working on is going to blow our previous product and your mind away!

We‚Äôre building a mobile-based platform to make your finances easier by building an all-in-one app that synchronises all your financial accounts and simplifies payments.

This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking.


WE CAN OFFER YOU  üèÜ

-The chance to work under the guidance of our CEO, who pioneered mobile banking at Lloyds, NatWest, Halifax and challenger applications like Revolut.

-An international, fun and dynamic team that is located in the heart of the financial district of Canary Wharf at the largest Fintech Accelerator in Europe - Level 39 in London, UK.

-Exciting work on an innovative project with plenty of responsibilities and freedoms. 
-A modern cafeteria offering complimentary access to hot drinks, fresh fruit and more importantly 3pm cookie time.

-Fun social nights out.

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward-thinking and passionate company, where your work will have an immeasurable impact, here we are!

Feel like you‚Äôre ready to accept the challenge and embark on a new and exciting chapter of your life?

Let‚Äôs make a difference together!

Sync.Money UK Ltd is an equal opportunities employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age or veteran status. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.‚Ä®All successful candidates will be required to undertake Disclosure and Barring Service (DBS) checks at the appropriate level for the post.

**JOB INTRO üîé**

Someone to bring positive energy and a smile to the workplace. Whilst we may be building a company and a brand, we‚Äôre also building bonds that can last a lifetime.

**Other skills required as a Marketing Manager include:**

‚Ä¢ English speaking, with multiple languages beneficial.
‚Ä¢ Hardworking, willing to take responsibility but also a co-worker.
‚Ä¢ Proactive, willing to get involved with the wider team and helping where possible.
‚Ä¢ Being passionate about your job and taking the initiative on coming up with new ideas how we can improve our product, culture and company. ‚Ä¢ You are part of the community but a user too!
‚Ä¢ Willing to learn but also to coach others where possible.
‚Ä¢ Understanding about the importance of our product, the customer experience to peoples everyday lives and the need to support them where appropriate.

**HOW YOU WILL HELP US SUCCEED**

‚Ä¢	To develop and lead projects to build brand awareness and relevance
‚Ä¢	To develop the promotional marketing calendar with key stakeholders
‚Ä¢	To ensure the proposed marketing calendar makes the best used of the marketing budget by ensuring it is spent effectively
‚Ä¢	Creation and publication of all marketing material in line with marketing plans
‚Ä¢	Adjusts marketing campaigns and strategies as needed
‚Ä¢	Monitor and report on effectiveness of marketing communications
‚Ä¢	To develop a plan to meet key KPIs agreed with key stakeholders
‚Ä¢	Coach and develop the marketing team

**WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª**

‚Ä¢	At least 4 years‚Äô experience at a Marketing Manager level within the FinTech, banking, payments or e-Money industries
‚Ä¢	Proven track record of managing multiple marketing campaigns at once
‚Ä¢	A creative mind and willing to propose crazy ideas to ensure we can be different
‚Ä¢	Experience with Google Analytics, PPC and AdWords etc‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢	Experience and knowledge of how to maximise growth using a variety of channels, including SEO, Content Marketing, Email campaigns, etc‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢	Great motivation and a drive to succeed
‚Ä¢	Planning and organisation skills
‚Ä¢	Incredible Attention to detail
‚Ä¢	Experience in managing a small team and able to coach juniors


**SALARY üíµ**

Will market competitive and will depend on the location, position and experience of the candidate.


**WHO WE ARE üòé**

sync. is a young and exciting FinTech company headquartered at Level39 in Canary Wharf in the Centre of London with a second hub in the Historical Centre of Malaga, Spain, right next to the Picasso Museum. Our driving ambition is to save people time and money. It‚Äôs what motivates us to come in to work every morning knowing that we could be making a real difference to people‚Äôs lives.

We combine the very best of features and services across the market, whilst also creating our own, to make a unique product that can be everything to everyone. We always say that great products and built by great teams. We‚Äôre very much on our way to building both but need more great people to achieve all of our lofty goals and ambitions. Are you that person? Apply now

Why the ‚úñÔ∏è, crossover, where old banking meets the new world of innovation, disruption and inclusion. We are sync. and you could be too.

Read more about us on our blog or follow our latest news on Twitter.


**WHY US ü§î**

There are 2 things we love doing. Disrupting the relevant landscape and saving people money. We know what you‚Äôre thinking. It‚Äôs either ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the connection between the two?‚Äù or ‚ÄúSo do I, so how can I be involved?‚Äù. Well we have the answer to both questions, read on‚Ä¶

As a result, we‚Äôre now looking for motivated applicants to join our team as we develop our new product. This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking. 

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!


**WHAT WE DO ‚úñÔ∏è**

We are aiming to lead the way in Smart Open Banking. We allow users to instantly open a current GBP &/or EUR account in minutes and we provide them with the ability to open up to 30+ other currency accounts. Users are able to exchange currencies between their accounts at the best rates and transfer money worldwide and unbeatable rates. Learn more about our features here.

sync.‚Äôs USP is to allow users to synchronise all of their financial accounts (bank, credit, loan and mortgage accounts) in one app, as one experience by utilising our AISP snd PISP licenses. By being able to budget, manage and track all of their accounts and expenses in one place, offering our users unrivalled user experience as a money management platform and be their financial advisor.

This then translates into tailored recommendations on how to save time and money through our marketplace of products from numerous financial and retail service providers that we have deals with.

"Our ultimate goal is for our users to better understand their saving, spending and investing habits and to make easy, simple, beautiful and accessible to everyone".


**WHAT WE OFFER üèÜ**

>  Salary package that rewards you.

Hard-working, dedicated and talented people deserve to be rewarded and that‚Äôs why we offer you a salary and bonus package that will reward you for your contribution.

>  Flexible hours for a flexible lifestyle.

We know flexibility is important in this day and age. We also know we can trust you to know when you‚Äôre at your best, which is why we encourage working smarter not harder.

>  Satisfying and fulfilling.

Both of our offices are stocked with plenty of snacks and drinks for you to enjoy.

>  A workplace for you.

Choose between our City Centre office in London or by the beach in Malaga. Regardless of which one you choose we‚Äôll make sure you‚Äôre using the best equipment available.

>  Discounts to cash in on.

Use our dedicated employee portal to save you time and money at some of your favourite retailers and restaurant.


**SOME OTHER BENEFITS üèÜ**

>  An office you can call home.

Use our beautiful office space to organise and run events planned by our team, for our team, for a fun filled evening. Feel free to get involved and organise some yourself!

>  Opportunities to Grow.

We love when people join us and stay with us and that‚Äôs why we offer you amazing growth opportunities. You have the opportunities for promotions, internal transfers and even international transfers as we look to open up more offices worldwide.

If you want to build sync. in your country or in your city then tell us, push us and help us expand our technology and values to your home.

>  Our products are for everyone, and so are our offices.

We value diversity on an individual level. We‚Äôre dedicated to creating an environment where people can share their own diverse backgrounds, experiences, perspectives & ideas.

sync. money is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.


**READY TO TAKE THE LEAP? üöÄ**

Feel like you‚Äôre ready to accept the challenge and embark on a new and exciting chapter of your life? Click below to apply for the Marketing Manager job role at sync. money and let‚Äôs make a difference together.


**RECRUITERS NOTICE ‚ö†Ô∏è**

This Role is for direct applications only for a full time position and our HR Department will not be responding to any Recruitment Agencies, software firms or freelancers that contact us.

‚Ä¢  Design mood boards, comps (with and without wireframes), concept sketches, presentation decks, style guides, and high fidelity prototypes.
‚Ä¢  Explain and discuss design decisions and give design feedback.
‚Ä¢  Partner with product owners and other designers to constantly refine the sync. design language and create innovative, great-looking products.

**WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED üíª**

‚Ä¢  A minimum of 4yrs of experience as a UI Visual Designer.
‚Ä¢  Experience with industry-standard design tools (e.g. Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketch).
‚Ä¢  Experience in designing digital products (e.g. interactive/digital/graphic designer).
‚Ä¢  Strong communication skills.
‚Ä¢  A portfolio showcasing your work.


**SALARY üíµ**

Will market competitive and will depend on the location, position and experience of the candidate.


**WHO WE ARE üòé**

sync. is a young and exciting FinTech company headquartered at Level39 in Canary Wharf in the Centre of London with a second hub in the Historical Centre of Malaga, Spain, right next to the Picasso Museum. Our driving ambition is to save people time and money. It‚Äôs what motivates us to come in to work every morning knowing that we could be making a real difference to people‚Äôs lives.

We combine the very best of features and services across the market, whilst also creating our own, to make a unique product that can be everything to everyone. We always say that great products and built by great teams. We‚Äôre very much on our way to building both but need more great people to achieve all of our lofty goals and ambitions. Are you that person? Apply now

Why the ‚úñÔ∏è, crossover, where old banking meets the new world of innovation, disruption and inclusion. We are sync. and you could be too.

Read more about us on our blog or follow our latest news on Twitter.


**WHY US ü§î**

There are 2 things we love doing. Disrupting the relevant landscape and saving people money. We know what you‚Äôre thinking. It‚Äôs either ‚Äúwhat‚Äôs the connection between the two?‚Äù or ‚ÄúSo do I, so how can I be involved?‚Äù. Well we have the answer to both questions, read on‚Ä¶

As a result, we‚Äôre now looking for motivated applicants to join our team as we develop our new product. This exciting new project is going to change the way people interact with their finances and will take us to the forefront of alternative banking. 

If you have the ambition of working in a truly exciting, forward thinking and passionate company, where your work will have immeasurable impact, here we are!


**WHAT WE DO ‚úñÔ∏è**

We are aiming to lead the way in Smart Open Banking. We allow users to instantly open a current GBP &/or EUR account in minutes and we provide them with the ability to open up to 30+ other currency accounts. Users are able to exchange currencies between their accounts at the best rates and transfer money worldwide and unbeatable rates. Learn more about our features here.

sync.‚Äôs USP is to allow users to synchronise all of their financial accounts (bank, credit, loan and mortgage accounts) in one app, as one experience by utilising our AISP snd PISP licenses. By being able to budget, manage and track all of their accounts and expenses in one place, offering our users unrivalled user experience as a money management platform and be their financial advisor.

This then translates into tailored recommendations on how to save time and money through our marketplace of products from numerous financial and retail service providers that we have deals with.

"Our ultimate goal is for our users to better understand their saving, spending and investing habits and to make easy, simple, beautiful and accessible to everyone".


**WHAT WE OFFER üèÜ**

>  Salary package that rewards you.

Hard-working, dedicated and talented people deserve to be rewarded and that‚Äôs why we offer you a salary and bonus package that will reward you for your contribution.

>  Flexible hours for a flexible lifestyle.

We know flexibility is important in this day and age. We also know we can trust you to know when you‚Äôre at your best, which is why we encourage working smarter not harder.

>  Satisfying and fulfilling.

Both of our offices are stocked with plenty of snacks and drinks for you to enjoy.

>  A workplace for you.

Choose between our City Centre office in London or by the beach in Malaga. Regardless of which one you choose we‚Äôll make sure you‚Äôre using the best equipment available.

>  Discounts to cash in on.

Use our dedicated employee portal to save you time and money at some of your favourite retailers and restaurant.


**SOME OTHER BENEFITS üèÜ**

>  An office you can call home.

Use our beautiful office space to organise and run events planned by our team, for our team, for a fun filled evening. Feel free to get involved and organise some yourself!

>  Opportunities to Grow.

We love when people join us and stay with us and that‚Äôs why we offer you amazing growth opportunities. You have the opportunities for promotions, internal transfers and even international transfers as we look to open up more offices worldwide.

If you want to build sync. in your country or in your city then tell us, push us and help us expand our technology and values to your home.

>  Our products are for everyone, and so are our offices.

We value diversity on an individual level. We‚Äôre dedicated to creating an environment where people can share their own diverse backgrounds, experiences, perspectives & ideas.

sync. money is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, colour, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.


**READY TO TAKE THE LEAP? üöÄ**

Feel like you‚Äôre ready to accept the challenge and embark on a new and exciting chapter of your life? Click below to apply for the UI Visual Designer job role at sync. money and let‚Äôs make a difference together.


**RECRUITERS NOTICE ‚ö†Ô∏è**

This Role is for direct applications only for a full time position and our HR Department will not be responding to any Recruitment Agencies, software firms or freelancers that contact us.
